4304650.name: Extract Game
4304650.description:
Play how you want.

Idle‑friendly. Point‑and‑click. System‑heavy. Multiplayer.

Build your character through layered progression systems, risk your gear in dangerous worlds, and discover scaling rewards driven by how you choose to play.

Find and craft powerful gear, optimize branching skill trees, and push your character through increasingly dangerous activities where preparation matters more than reflexes.

Twelve long‑term progression skills, each expandable through large branching skill trees that let you specialize into idle efficiency, active grinding, economy manipulation, or high‑risk exploration.

Whether you’re pathing optimal routes, scaling reward multipliers, or trading on the exchange, every decision compounds your growth.

Every tile counts.

The world runs on a tile‑based simulation.

Movement, interaction, and danger are resolved on a grid, creating a slower, strategic pacing where positioning and planning define survival.

High‑Risk, System‑Driven Minigames.

Fallout Zone

A talisman‑modified procedural world where every step advances time. Monsters roam, resources scale with distance, and escape is never guaranteed.

Fallout Tunnel

A narrow, difficulty‑scaled survival path. Push deeper for higher rewards or lose everything trying.

Artifact Worlds

Procedural skilling zones generated from artifact modifiers. Control node density, idle duration, and multiplayer accessibility.

Wave Machine

A high‑intensity survival arena. Dodge ground effects and stacking debuffs as difficulty escalates.

Coming Soon - Mercenaries

Deploy hired units on autonomous expeditions. Equip them, specialize them, and scale their reward output over time.

Itemization Depth.

Discover a massive pool of gear driven by layered affix systems and crafting mechanics.

  • 650+ Unique Items

  • 300+ Affixes (Tier 8 → Tier 1 scaling)

  • 45+ Affix Modifying Item Crafts

  • 5 Unique Crafting Mechanics

  • Targeted Loot Tables

  • Progressive Drop Scaling

Player Economy

Trade freely in a fully player‑driven market.

  • Direct player trading

  • Async buy/sell offers

  • Exchange auto‑matching

  • Market arbitrage opportunities

Two economic rule sets:

Standard - Stable progression economy
Accelerated - 3× rewards, exponential item inflation, and economy‑breaking strategies

Choose your chaos level.

Social & Multiplayer Systems

A shared world with layered interaction systems:

  • Global, Local, and Private Chat

  • Friends System

  • Gear & Build Inspection

  • Public Minigame Worlds

  • Shared Resource States

Leaderboards & Competitive Progression

Track progression across multiple ranking categories:

  • All 12 Skills

  • Total Experience

  • Total Level

  • Prophecies Completed

  • Prophetic Points Gained

  • Fallout Tunnel Difficulty

  • Wave Machine Difficulty

  • Item Discovery

Optimize your build to climb the ladder.

World & Interaction Depth

The environment is a system, not just scenery.

  • 175+ Interactable World Objects

  • 500+ Object Interactions

  • 800+ Item → Item Interactions

  • Item → World Interaction Systems

Experimentation unlocks hidden efficiencies.

Optimize your build. Break the economy. Risk your gear. Shape the world.
